original_text: They taught you to change the way that you live. You must put away the nature that you had before. That old nature deceived you. As a result, you wanted to do things that would destroy you.
korean_text: 너희는 유혹의 욕심을 따라 썩어져 가는 구습을 따르는 옛 사람을 벗어 버리고

sentences.original_text: They taught you to change the way that you live
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너에게 사는 방식을 바꾸도록 가르쳤다

sentences.original_text: You must put away the nature that you had before
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이전에 가졌던 성품을 버려야 한다

sentences.original_text: As a result, you wanted to do things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 너는 행동들을 하고 싶었다
